message.content: {"given_definition_quality":70,"better_definition":"to be on holiday or take a break from work or school","sentence":"我们放假。","image_prompt":"A group of people walking happily together outside a school. Soft apocalypse animation style, pastel tones, subtle background of a school and green trees, with soft light conveying relaxation and freedom.","sentence_translation":"We are on holiday."}
